options.name: Minor Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Beginner Spells from the Divine or Aeromancy schools of magic.

options.name: Innate Levitation
options.description: Gain a Hover Speed equal to your Movement Speed.

options.name: Skylord's Protection
options.description: Gain +2 Electric, +1 Dark and +1 Physical Mitigation

options.name: The Language of the Wind
options.description: You gain the Aeron Language and gain +1 Spell Damage

options.name: Action [Daily] : Elemental Form
options.description: You take the form of an Air Sprite, gaining it's stat block for 1 minute or until you reach 0 Health. At Level 5, this ability improves, allowing you to take the form of an Air Elementaling instead. At Level 9, you can take the form of an Air Elemental

options.name: Reaction : Electric Rod
options.description: In response to you or an ally within 4 units taking electric damage, reduce that damage by an amount equal to your level. The next Aeromancy spell you channel before the end of your next turn is charged. If that spell deals electric damage, the damage is increased by an amount equal to your level.

options.name: Lesser Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Novice Spells from the Divine or Aeromancy schools of magic.

options.name: Free Action : Smiting Thunder
options.description: After making a Melee or Ranged Attack, immediately make another attack with that same weapon against the same target, dealing only the Primary Damage which is all converted to electric.

options.name: Swift
options.description: You gain +1 Movement Speed and +1 Dodge

options.name: Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Journeyman Spells from the Divine or Aeromancy schools of magic.

options.name: Storm Giant's Strength
options.description: Gain +2 Strength and +1 Damage with Melee Attacks

options.name: Action [Daily] : Mount of the Valkyr
options.description: You touch a Horse, transforming it into a Pegasus which is considered your pet. This enchantment lasts until the Pegasus dies, which it returns to the Plane of Valor. Only one horse can be transformed by this enchantment at a time.

options.name: Greater Planar Magic
options.description: You learn 4 Expert Spells from the Divine or Aeromancy schools of magic. At level 10, learn 2 Master Spells from the Divine or Aeromancy schools of magic. Additionally, gain +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage.

options.name: Action : Lighter than Air
options.description: You take a modified version of the Move Action where you have a flight speed equal to 8 units plus your Spell Damage Bonus Modifier. This movement does not provoke reactions.

options.name: Aeron Connection
options.description: You have a connection with the Plane of Aeron, or one of it's adjacent planes, manifesting in minor or major changes to your appearance.
